H2.text: who was the first governor of colonial south carolina. William Sayle

H3.text: who was the first governor of colonial south carolina. Thomas Pinckney

A4.text: In 1670, William Sayle, then in his eighties, became the first Colonial Governor of the colony of Carolina

A5.text: In 1669, Carolina would be split into two provinces, and in 1712 the southern Clarendon province, that included Charleston, became South Carolina
